Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Game

extends java.lang.Object
    Laboratorio unidad 3
    Author:
    César Canales
    Universidad Icesi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game()
      This function initializes a new game and loads the serialized scores, if there are any.

      • addScore

        public void addScore(java.lang.String name,
                     int score)
              throws java.io.IOException
        This function adds a new score to the hall of fame if it's better than any of the current ones.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the player that achieved the score.
        score - The score number.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the specified path doesn't exist.
